src: Mums tagad ir 4 mēnešus vecas peles, kas nav diabēta slimnieces, bet kuras agrāk bija diabēta slimnieces, viņš piebilda.
mt: 4 month old puppies that are not diabetic but were diabetic earlier, he adds.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dalhuzī Universitātes, kas atrodas Helifeksā, Jaunskotijā, medicīnas profesors un Kanādas Diabēta asociācijas Klīniskā un zinātniskā departamenta priekšsēdētājs Dr. Ehuds Ūrs brīdināja, ka pētījums vēl ir tikai pašā sākuma stadijā.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a Dalhousie University professor in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association's Clinical and Scientific Department, warned that the study is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Tāpat kā daži citi speciālisti, viņš skeptiski raugās uz to, vai diabētu iespējams ārstēt, un norāda, ka šie pētījuma rezultāti nav saistīti ar cilvēkiem, kuri jau slimo ar 1. tipa cukura diabētu.
mt: Like many other experts, he looked skeptically at the idea of curing diabetes, and noted that these research results are not related to people who already suffer from type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Zviedrijas Akadēmijas Nobela komitejas, kas piešķirt prēmijas literatūrā, ilggadējā sekretāre Sara Daniusa pirmdien Zviedrijas radio „Sveriges Radio” raidījumā publiski paziņoja, ka komiteja nav varējusi tieši sasniegt Bobu Dilanu saistībā ar 2016. gada Nobela prēmijas literatūrā iegūšanu un savus mēģinājumus viņu sasniegt vairs neturpinās.
mt: Sara Danius, the Swedish Academy's secretary, who awards the Nobel Prize in Literature, announced on Monday in a Swedish radio interview that the committee had not been able to directly reach Bob Dylan in connection with his winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature and that it would no longer try to reach him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Daniusa sacīja: "Šobrīd mēs nedarām neko. Es esmu zvanījusi un nosūtījusi viņa tuvākajam līdzstrādniekam e-pasta vēstules, un saņēmusi ļoti draudzīgas atbildes. Patriez ar to noteikti pietiek."
mt: Danius said: "We're not doing anything right now. I've called and sent his closest co-worker an e-mail, and I've received very friendly responses. Patriez is definitely fine."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Iepriekš uzņēmuma „Ring” izpilddirektors Džeimijs Siminofs atzīmēja, ka viņš nodibinājis uzņēmumu tad, kad viņa veikala durvju zvans nebija dzirdams garāžā.
mt: Previously, the CEO of the "Ring" company, James Siminoff, noted that he founded the company when the doorbell of his store was not heard in the garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Pēc viņa teiktā viņš izgudroja bezvadu durvju zvanu.
mt: According to him, he invented a wireless doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminofs teica, ka pārdošanas apjomi pieauga pēc tam, kad viņš 2013. gadā piedalījās vienā realitātes seriāla „Shark Tank” sērijā, kurā šova speciālistu komanda finansējumu jaunuzņēmumam nepiešķīra.
mt: Siminof said sales increased after he appeared on a 2013 episode of the reality show “Shark Tank,” where the show’s panel of investors declined to finance his startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017. gada beigās Smirnoff parādījās televīzijas iepirkšanās kanālā QVC.
mt: 2017 saw Smirnoff appear on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Uzņēmums „Ring” arī atrisināja strīdu ar konkurējošo drošības uzņēmumu „ADT Corporation”.
mt: The company "Ring" also resolved the dispute with the competing security company "ADT Corporation".
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Kaut gan viena eksperimentālā vakcīna izrādās spējīga samazināt mirstību no Ebolas vīrusa, līdz šim nevienas zāles nav skaidri pierādījušas, ka var izārstēt esošo infekciju.
mt: Although one experimental vaccine has shown promise in reducing mortality from Ebola virus, no drug has yet been clearly shown to cure an existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Viens antivielu kokteilis „ZMapp” sākotnēji šķita daudzsološs problēmas risinājums, taču oficiālie pētījumi parādīja, ka tam ir zemāka iedarbība uz mirstības novēršanu nekā domāts.
mt: One antiviral cocktail, "ZMapp," initially seemed like a promising solution to the problem, but official studies showed it had a lower survival rate than expected.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM pētījumā ZMapp bija kontroles līdzeklis, proti, zinātnieki to izmantoja kā sākotnējo rādītāju un salīdzināja trīs cita veida terapijas ar šo līdzekli.
mt: The PALM study used ZMapp as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared it to three other therapies.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: ASV Vingrošanas federācija atbalsta Amerikas Savienoto Valstu Olimpiskās komitejas vēstuli un atzīst olimpiskās ģimenes absolūto nepieciešamību veicināt drošu vidi visiem mūsu sportistiem.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Federation supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the absolute necessity of providing a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Mēs piekrītam USOC apgalvojumam, ka mūsu sportistu un klubu, kā arī viņu sporta veidu intereses var labāk apmierināt, virzoties uz priekšu ar jēgpilnām izmaiņām mūsu organizācijā, nevis sertifikācijas pārtraukšanu.
mt: We agree with USOC's statement that our athletes and clubs, as well as their sport interests, can be better served by moving forward with full reforms of our organization, rather than a suspension of our accreditation.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: ASV Vingrošanas federācija atbalsta neatkarīgu izmeklēšanu, kas var atklāt to, kā Lerija Nasara ļaunprātīgo pāridarījumu apmērs, ko upuri tik drosmīgi aprakstījuši, tik ilgi varēja netikt atklāts un aptver visas nepieciešamās un atbilstošās izmaiņas.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Federation supports an independent investigation that may reveal how much of the abusive conduct of Larry Nassar was known, how long it was known, and covers all necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: ASV Vingrošanas federācijai un USOC ir viens un tas pats mērķis - padarīt vingrošanu un citus sporta veidus pēc iespējas drošākus, lai sportisti varētu sekot saviem sapņiem drošā, pozitīvā un tiesīgā vidē.
mt: The USOC and USA Gymnastics have the same goal: to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible so athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and fair environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Pagājušā gadsimta sešdesmitajos gados Bžezinskis strādāja pie Džona Kenedija kā viņa padomnieks un pēc tam Lindona Džonsona administrācijā.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John Kennedy as an advisor and later in the administration of Lyndon Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976. gada vēlēšanās viņš konsultēja Kārteru par ārpolitiku; pēc tam no 1977. līdz 1981. gadam no viņš ieņēma nacionālās drošības padomnieka (NSA) amatu, pārņemot Henrija Kisingera pienākumus.
mt: 1976 Carter consulted Kissinger on foreign policy; from 1977 to 1981 he served as national security advisor, taking over Kissinger's duties.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Viņš kā nacionālās drošības padomnieks palīdzēja Kārteram diplomātiski risināt starptautiskus jautājumus, piemēram, noslēdzot Kempdeividas vienošanos 1978. gadā, normalizējot ASV un Ķīnas attiecības 1970.-to gadu beigās, risinot jautājumus saistībā ar Irānas revolūciju, kas noveda pie Irānas ķīlnieku krīzes 1979. gadā, kā arī saistībā ar Padomju Savienības iebrukumu 1979. gadā.
mt: He served as a national security advisor to Carter, helping him diplomatically resolve international issues, such as the Camp David Accords in 1978, normalizing U.S. and Chinese relations in the late 1970s, resolving issues related to the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis in 1979, as well as issues related to the Soviet invasion in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Filma, kurā piedalās Raiens Goslings un Emma Stouna, saņēma nominācijas visās galvenajās kategorijās.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Goslings un Stouna saņēma attiecīgi "Labākā aktiera" un "Labākās aktrises" nominācijas.
mt: Gosling and Stone won the "Best Actor" and "Best Actress" awards respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Pārējās nominācijās ietilpst labākā filma, režisors, kinematogrāfija, kostīmu dizains, filmu montāža, oriģinālmūzika, mākslinieka darbs, skaņas montāža, skaņa un oriģinālscenārijs.
mt: Other categories include best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, film editing, original score, makeup and hairstyling, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Divas filmas dziesmas — "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" un "City of Stars" — saņēma nominācijas par labāko oriģināldziesmu. Studija "Lionsgate" saņēma 26 nominācijas — vairāk nekā jebkura cita studija.
mt: 2 songs from the movie — "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars" — were nominated for best original song. Studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Svētdienas izskaņā ASV prezidents Donalds Tramps sava preses sekretāra izplatītajā paziņojumā pasludināja, ka ASV karaspēks pametīs Sīriju.
mt: In a statement released by his press secretary on Saturday, U.S. President Donald Trump announced that U.S. troops will be withdrawing from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Paziņojums izskanēja pēc tam, kad Trampam bija telefonsaruna ar Turcijas prezidentu Redžepu Tajipu Erdoganu.
mt: The announcement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turcija pārņems arī sagūstīto ISIS kaujinieku apsargāšanu, kurus, kā teikts paziņojumā, Eiropas valstis ir atteikušās repatriēt.
mt: Turkey will also take custody of captured ISIS fighters, who, according to the statement, European countries have refused to repatriate.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Tas ne tikai apstiprina, ka vismaz dažiem dinozauriem bija spalvas, šī teorija jau bija plaši izplatīta, bet arī sniedz informāciju, ko fosilijas vispārīgi nevar, piemēram, krāsu un trīsdimensiju izvietojumu.
mt: It not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that was already widely accepted, but also provides information that fossils in general cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Zinātnieki saka, ka šī dzīvnieka apspalvojums augšpusē bija kastaņbrūnā krāsā, bet apakšpusē — karotinoīdu krāsās.
mt: Scientists say the animal's fur on top was chestnut brown, but on the bottom was in shades of gray.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Šis atradums arī sniedz ieskatu putnu spalvu attīstībā.
mt: This discovery also sheds light on the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Tā kā dinozauru spalvām nebija labi attīstīts kāts, ko sauc par stobru, taču ir pārējās spalvām piemītošās īpašībās, proti, stari un stariņi, tad pētnieki izdarīja secinājumus, ka stobrs, visticamāk, radās vēlākā evolūcijas attīstības fāzē nekā šīs īpašības.
mt: Because the dinosaur's frill, which is called a crest, had not fully developed a spike, but had other frill features, such as spikes and spikes, researchers concluded that the spike, most likely, occurred in a later stage of evolutionary development than these features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Spalvu struktūra liecina, ka tās netika izmantotas lidojumā, bet drīzāk temperatūras regulēšanai vai izrādīšanai. Pētnieki norādīja, ka, lai arī šī ir jauna dinozaura aste, paraugā redzams pieaugušo putnu apspalvojums, nevis mazulīša pūkas.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or display. Researchers noted that, although this is a new dinosaur tail, the specimen shows adult bird plumage, not baby down.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Pētnieki ierosināja, ka, lai arī šī ir jauna dinozaura aste, paraugā redzams pieaugušo apspalvojums, nevis mazulīša pūkas.
mt: Researchers suggested that, although this is a new dinosaur tail, the specimen shows adult feathers, not baby down.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Automašīnā ievietots spridzeklis, kas vakar no rīta uzsprāga pie Gaziantepas policijas administrācijas Turcijā, nogalināja divus policistus un ievainoja vairāk nekā divdesmit citus cilvēkus.
mt: A bomb placed in a police vehicle exploded outside the Gaziantep police headquarters in Turkey last night, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Gubernatora birojs paziņoja, ka deviņpadsmit no ievainotajiem bija policisti.
mt: 9 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Policija paziņoja, ka par uzbrukuma izdarīšanu aizdomās tiek turēts cilvēks, kas tiek uzskatīts par organizācijas „Daesh” (ISIL) kaujinieku.
mt: Police say a man is being held on suspicion of carrying out the attack, who is believed to be a fighter for the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL).
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Viņi atklāja, ka Saule darbojas pēc tiem pašiem pamatprincipiem kā citas zvaigznes: tika atklāts, ka visu sistēmas zvaigžņu darbību nosaka to spožums, rotācija un nekas cits.
mt: They discovered that the Sun works according to the same basic principles as other stars: it was found that the entire system's star activity is determined by its brightness, rotation and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Starjaudu un rotāciju kopā izmanto, lai noteiktu zvaigznes Rosbija skaitli, kas saistīts ar plazmas plūsmu.
mt: The star tracker and gyroscope are used to determine the Rosby number, which is related to the plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Jo mazāks Rosbija skaitlis, jo mazāk aktīva zvaigzne ir attiecībā uz magnētiskajām apvērsēm.
mt: The smaller the Rosby number, the more active the star is in relation to magnetic reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Sava ceļojuma laikā Ivasaki daudz reizes piedzīvoja nepatikšanas.
mt: During his journey, Ivasaki experienced many strange occurrences.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Viņu aplaupīja pirāti, Tibetā viņam uzbruka traks suns, viņš izglābās no laulībām Nepālā un tika arestēts Indijā.
mt: 1. He was attacked by pirates, in Tibet a truck hit him, he escaped from marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n standarts darbojas gan 2,4 GHz, gan 5,0 GHz frekvencēs.
mt: 802.11n standards work in both 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Tas ļaus tam būt atpakaļsaderīgam ar 802.11a, 802.11b un 802.11g, ja vien bāzes stacijai ir divi radioaparāti.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are backwards compatible, provided the base station has two radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n ātrums ir ievērojami lielāks nekā tā priekšgājējiem ar maksimālo teorētisko caurlaidspēju 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speed is significantly higher than its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvāls, kurš ir precējies un kuram ir divi pieauguši bērni, neatstāja lielu iespaidu uz Milleri, ar kuru bija saistīts stāsts.
mt: The divorced father of two, who had a large impact on Miller, was involved in a story with her.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Kad viņam jautāja komentāru, Millers sacīja: "Maiks noklausīšanās laikā daudz runā...es gatavojos, tāpēc īsti nedzirdēju, ko viņš saka."
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike listens a lot...I was ready, so I really didn't hear what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: Mēs centīsimies līdz 2020. gadam ar ievērojamu starpību attiecībā pret 2005. gada līmeni samazināt oglekļa dioksīda emisijas uz IKP vienību, sacīja Hu.
mt: We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant amount by 2020 compared to 2005 levels, Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Viņš nenoteica konkrētu samazinājuma rādītāju, sakot, ka tas būs atkarīgs no Ķīnas ekonomiskajiem rezultātiem.
mt: He did not specify a specific reduction rate, saying it would depend on China's economic results.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu aicināja attīstības valstis "izvairīties no vecās pieejas, no sākuma piesārņojot un pēc tam satīrot."
mt: Hu urged developing countries to "avoid the old approach of polluting first and then cleaning up."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Viņš piebilda, ka "viņiem tomēr nevar izvirzīt prasību uzņemties pienākumus, kuri neatbilst viņu attīstības posma, atbildības līmenim un iespējām."
mt: He said that "they cannot be expected to take on responsibilities that are not commensurate with their stage of development, level of accountability and capabilities."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Irākas izpētes grupa prezentēja savu ziņojumu šodien plkst. 12:00 pēc GMT laika.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraqi investigation group presented its report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Tas brīdina, ka neviens nevar garantēt, ka kāda konkrēta rīcība pašlaik varēs apturēt reliģisko karu, aizvien plašāko vardarbību un valsts ieslīgšanu haosā.
mt: It warns that no one can guarantee that any particular action will halt the religious war, the ever-widening violence and the state's slide into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Ziņojums sākas ar lūgumu par atklātām debatēm un vienprātības veidošanu Amerikas Savienotajās Valstīs attiecībā uz Tuvo Austrumu politiku.
mt: The report begins with a call for open debate and consensus in the United States on Middle Eastern policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Ziņojumā ir ļoti kritiska attieksme pret gandrīz visiem pašreizējās izpildvaras politikas aspektiem attiecībā uz Irāku, un tas mudina nekavējoties mainīt virzienu.
mt: The statement is highly critical of almost all aspects of the current administration's policy towards Iraq, and it encourages a change of direction without delay.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Pirmā no tā 78 rekomendācijām ir, ka līdz šā gada beigām būtu jāpieņem jauna diplomātiskā iniciatīva, lai nostiprinātu Irākas robežas pret naidīgiem uzbrukumiem un atjaunotu diplomātiskās attiecības ar kaimiņvalstīm.
mt: 1 of its 78 recommendations is that by the end of this year a new diplomatic initiative should be taken to strengthen Iraq's borders against hostile attacks and to restore diplomatic relations with neighboring countries.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Vakar vakarā Laplatas pilsētā, kas atrodas 50 km (31 jūdzi) no Buenosairesas, pašreizējā senatore un Argentīnas pirmā lēdija Kristina Fernandesa de Kiršnere paziņoja par savu kandidatūru prezidenta amatam.
mt: Last night in the city of La Plata, which is 50 km (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, the current senator and first lady of Argentina, Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, announced her candidacy for the presidency.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Kirhneres kundze par savu nodomu kandidēt uz prezidenta amatu paziņoja Argentīnas teātrī — turpat, kur viņa sāka savu 2005. gada kampaņu, kandidējot senāta vēlēšanās Buenosairesas provinces delegātu sastāvā.
mt: Kirkner announced her intention to run for president in the Argentine Theatre — the same place where she began her 2005 campaign, running for a seat in the Senate as a delegate from Buenos Aires Province.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Debates izraisīja diskusijas par izdevumiem palīdzības sniegšanai un atjaunošanai viesuļvētras "Katrīna" dēļ; daži fiskālie, konservatīvie cilvēki to ar humoru bija nodēvējuši par "Buša Jaunorleānas darījumu."
mt: The debates sparked discussions about the costs of aid and reconstruction due to Hurricane Katrina; some fiscal, conservative people jokingly called it the "Bush New Orleans deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Liberāļu kritikas par atjaunošanas pasākumiem centrā ir aizdomas, ka Vašingtons atjaunošanas līgumus piešķir „saviem cilvēkiem”.
mt: Liberals' criticism of the restoration efforts in the center is that Washington is giving restoration contracts to "its own people".
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Lai piedalītos bērēs, Romā ieradās vairāk nekā četri miljoni cilvēku.
mt: 4 million people attended the ceremonies in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Klātesošo cilvēku skaits bija tik liels, ka visiem nebija iespējams piekļūt bērēm Svētā Pētera laukumā.
mt: The crowd was so large that no one could get to the tomb of Saint Peter in the square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Dažādās Romas vietās tika uzstādīti vairāki lieli televizora ekrāni, lai cilvēki varētu vērot ceremoniju.
mt: In various parts of Rome, large television screens were set up so people could watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Daudzās citās Itālijas pilsētās un pārējās pasaules valstīs, jo īpaši Polijā, rīkojās līdzīgi,  un translāciju vēroja liels daudzums cilvēku.
mt: Similar events were held in many other Italian cities and other countries, especially Poland, and the translation was watched by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Vēsturnieki ir kritizējuši iepriekšējās FIB politikas, jo resursi ir tikuši koncentrēti uz lietām, kas ir viegli atrisināmas, jo īpaši automašīnu zādzību lietām, lai uzlabotu aģentūras atrisināto lietu rādītāju.
mt: Historians have criticized previous FIB policies, as resources have been concentrated on issues that are easily resolved, especially car theft, to improve the agency's solved case rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongress uzsāka finansējuma piešķiršanu piedauzības mazināšanas iniciatīvai 2005. fiskālajā gadā un noteica, ka FBI jānozīmē 10 aģenti pieaugušo pornogrāfijas apkarošanai.
mt: 2005, Congress began funding the initiative to reduce teen pregnancy and mandated that the FBI assign 10 agents to combat adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robins Utapa īningos sasniedza visaugstāko rezultātu: 70 skrējienos trāpot tieši 41 bumbiņai un gūstot šādu rezultātu: 11 skrējieni 4 punktu vērtībā un 2 skrējieni 6 punktu vērtībā.
mt: Robins Utapa scored the highest result: 70 shots hit the target exactly 41 times and scored 11 shots 4 points and 2 shots 6 points.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Vidus kārtas sitēji Sačins Tendulkars un Rahuls Dravids uzrādīja labu sniegumu un kopā ieguva 100 skrējienus.
mt: Middle order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid put up a good show and together scored 100 runs.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Taču pēc kapteiņa vārtu zaudējuma Indijai izdevās veikt tikai 36 pārskrējienus, zaudējot 7 vārtus līdz izspēles beigām.
mt: However, after losing the captain's gate, India was able to make only 36 passes, losing 7 goals until the end of the game.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: ASV prezidents Džordžs Bušs ieradās Singapūrā 16. novembra rītā, sākot nedēļu ilgo tūri pa Āziju.
mt: 16 November 2006, US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Viņu sveica Singapūras premjerministra vietnieks Vongs Kans Sengs, un viņš apsprieda tirdzniecības un terorisma jautājumus ar Singapūras premjerministru Lī Hsjenu Longu.
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Nedēļu pēc zaudēšanas vidustermiņa vēlēšanās Bušs paziņoja klātesošajiem par tirdzniecības paplašināšanu Āzijā.
mt: A week after losing the mid-term elections, Bush announced to those present that he would expand trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Otrdien pēc 25 minūšu ilgas tikšanās savā birojā ar Jaunās demokrātiskās partijas (NDP) vadītāju Džeku Leitonu premjerministrs Stīvens Hārpers piekrita valdības Likumu par tīru gaisu nosūtīt komitejai, kurā ietilpst visas partijas, lai tā to izskatītu pirms otrā lasījuma.
mt: On Tuesday, after a 25-minute meeting in his office with New Democratic Party (NDP) leader Jack Layton, Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the Clean Air Act to committee, where all parties will review it before second reading.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Leitons tikšanās laikā ar premjerministru lūdza mainīt konservatīvo vides likumprojektu, pieprasot Konservatīvās partijas vides likumprojekta "pilnīgu un galīgu pārrakstīšanu".
mt: The leader met with the prime minister and asked to change the conservative environmental bill, asking for a "complete and final rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environmental bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Kopš federālās valdības iesaistīšanās Mērsijas slimnīcas, kas atrodas Devonportā, Tasmānija, finansēšanas pārņemšanā valsts valdība un daži federālie parlamenta deputāti ir kritizējuši šo rīcību kā pirmsvēlēšanu triku saistībā ar novembrī sasaucamajām federālajām vēlēšanām.
mt: Since the federal government's involvement in the funding of the Mersey Hospital, which is located in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal parliamentarians have criticized this action as a pre-election trick in relation to the November federal elections.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Taču premjerministrs Džons Hovards bija teicis, ka šāda rīcība tika veikta tikai ar mērķi aizsargāt slimnīcas telpas no Tasmānijas valdības plānotās samazināšanas, piešķirot papildu 45 miljonus Austrālijas dolāru.
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard had said the action was taken only to protect hospital facilities from the planned cuts by the Tasmanian government, providing an additional 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Saskaņā ar jaunākajām ziņām jūras līmeņa mērījumi liecināja par cunami veidošanos. Pagopago un Niues apkaimē tika reģistrēta noteikta cunami aktivitāte.
mt: According to the latest reports, sea level measurements indicated a tsunami was forming. The area around Pago Pago and Niue registered a definite tsunami activity.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Tongā netika ziņots par lieliem postījumiem vai smagi ievainotajiem, taču uz laiku pazuda elektrība, kas, kā ziņo, neļāva Tongas varasiestādēm saņemt PTWC izdoto brīdinājumu par cunami.
mt: There were no reports of major damage or seriously injured, but the power outage, which reportedly prevented Tonga's emergency services from receiving the PTWC issued warning of a tsunami.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Havaju salās četrpadsmit skolas, kas atrodas pie krastiem vai piekrastes tuvumā, trešdien vēl bija slēgtas, neskatoties uz to, ka brīdinājumi bija atcelti.
mt: 14 schools on the Hawaiian islands were still closed on Wednesday, despite the cancellation of the warnings.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: ASV prezidents Džordžs Bušs atzinīgi novērtēja paziņojumu.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush praised the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Buša spīkers Gordons Džondrojs nosauca Ziemeļkorejas solījumu par "būtisku soli ceļā uz ticamu atteikšanos no kodolieročiem Korejas pussalā."
mt: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's offer "an important step on the road to a credible commitment to give up nuclear weapons on the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Atlantijas okeānā šodien izveidojās Atlantijas viesuļvētru sezonas desmitā vārdā nosauktā vētra - subtropu viesuļvētra "Džerijs".
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season formed today, subtropical storm "Jerry".
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Nacionālais viesuļvētru centrs (NHC) saka, ka šobrīd vētra "Džerijs" neapdraud zemi.
mt: The National Hurricane Center says the storm "Jerry" does not currently threaten land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: ASV Inženieru korpuss lēsa, ka 6 collu nokrišņu daudzums varētu pārplūst pār iepriekš sabojātajiem dambjiem.
mt: 6 inches of snow could overflow the damaged levees.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Devītajā administratīvajā rajonā, kurā viesuļvētras "Katrīna" laikā plūdi bija pat 20 pēdu augstumā, ūdens pašlaik ir vidukļa augstumā, jo netālu esošais dambis pārplūda.
mt: 20 feet of storm surge in the 10th administrative district, where Hurricane Katrina's storm surge was 20 feet, the water is now at the average height, as the nearby levee has breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Ūdens plūst 100 pēdu platā daļā virs dambja.
mt: 100 foot wide water is flowing over a dam.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Projekta "Commons" administrators Edams Kverdens sarunā ar "Wikinews" pagājušajā mēnesī izteica savu sašutumu par izdzēsto saturu.
mt: Project "Commons" administrator Ed Kverden expressed his disappointment in the deleted content in a discussion with "Wikinews" last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: Viņš [Veilzs] principā meloja mums no paša sākuma. Pirmkārt, izliekoties, ka tas bija juridisku iemeslu dēļ. Otrkārt, izliekoties, ka viņš mūsos klausījās līdz pat viņa mākslas dzēšanai.
mt: He lied to us from the start. First, by claiming it was due to legal reasons. Second, by claiming he listened to us until his art was destroyed.
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Sabiedrības aizkaitinājums noveda pie pašreizējiem centieniem sastādīt seksuāla rakstura politikas plānu vietnei, kura izmitina miljoniem atklāti licencētu mediju.
mt: The public outcry led to current efforts to draft a sex policy plan for the area, which hosts millions of openly licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Paveiktais darbs galvenokārt bija teorētisks, taču programma tika rakstīta, lai simulētu Strēlnieka galaktikas veiktos novērojumus.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate the observations made by the Strömgren galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Komandas meklēto efektu varētu izraisīt paisuma spēki starp galaktikas tumšo matēriju un Piena ceļa tumšo matēriju.
mt: The team's search for the effect could be caused by the pressure between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Tieši tāpat kā mēness iedarbojas uz Zemi, izraisot plūdmaiņas, Piena ceļš iedarbojas uz Strēlnieka galaktiku.
mt: Just as the moon affects the Earth, causing tides, the Milky Way affects the Strahlenberg Galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Zinātnieki varēja secināt, ka tumšā matērija ietekmē citas tumšās matērijas tādā pašā veidā kā parastā matērija.
mt: Scientists were able to conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as normal matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Šī teorija saka, ka lielākā daļa tumšās matērijas ap galaktiku atrodas apkārt galaktikai sava veida halo, un ir veidota no daudzām mazām daļiņām.
mt: This theory says that most of the dark matter around the galaxy is in a halo around the galaxy, and is made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Televīzijas pārraidēs redzams, ka no rūpnīcas nāk balti dūmi.
mt: In a television broadcast, smoke is seen coming from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Vietējās varas iestādes brīdina apkaimes iedzīvotājus palikt mājās, izslēgt gaisa kondicionētājus un nedzert ūdensvada ūdeni.
mt: Local authorities advise residents to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink water from the tap.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Saskaņā ar Japānas Kodolenerģijas aģentūras ziņām spēkstacijā ir atklāts radioaktīvais cēzijs un jods.
mt: According to the Japan Atomic Energy Agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been detected at the reactor.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Varasiestādes lēš, ka tas liecina par to, ka ir pārplīsušas notikuma vietā esošās urāna degvielu saturošās tvertnes un tajās radusies noplūde.
mt: The government says this indicates that the uranium fuel in the reactor core has melted and leaked.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tonijs Molls atklāja īpaši rezistento tuberkulozi (XDR-TB) Dienvidāfrikā, Kvazulu-Natālas reģionā.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in South Africa, in the KwaZulu-Natal region.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Intervijā viņš teica, ka jaunā variācija rada "ļoti lielas bažas un satraukumu, jo tai ir ļoti augsts mirstības rādītājs."
mt: In an interview he said, "The new variant is causing "great concern and fear, as it has a very high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Dr. Molls domā, ka daži pacienti varēja inficēties slimnīcā, un vismaz divi bija slimnīcas veselības aprūpes darbinieki.
mt: Dr. Moll believes that some patients may have been infected in the hospital, and at least two were hospital health care workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
